user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (editor@vitalvoices.com) and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for any information she needs.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Follow‐Up on Your Contribution to Vital Voices

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! Mr. Thompson asked me to reach out and kindly remind you to reply to him at editor@vitalvoices.com regarding your upcoming interview/guest article for Vital Voices. He’s eager to coordinate the next steps with you.

If you need to review any reference materials or previous notes, please feel free to check your Gmail and Notion—everything should be available there for your convenience.

Thank you so much for your time and advocacy, and we look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
On behalf of Mr. Thompson  
Vital Voices

final_output:
Subject: Follow‐Up on Your Contribution to Vital Voices

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! Mr. Thompson asked me to reach out and kindly remind you to reply to him at editor@vitalvoices.com regarding your upcoming interview/guest article for Vital Voices. He’s eager to coordinate the next steps with you.

If you need to review any reference materials or previous notes, please feel free to check your Gmail and Notion—everything should be available there for your convenience.

Thank you so much for your time and advocacy, and we look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
On behalf of Mr. Thompson  
Vital Voices
